name: [Game Jam 2023] On Purpose
description:
We exerted the function of Root - the math sign - to make a puzzle-solving game. The player can alter some blocks with the ability of the character: Root. Try your best to resolve all problems you encounter on the way. 

Instruction:

  • A - move left
  • D - move right
  • Space - jump
  • R - rotate
  • Backspace - replay the current level
  • Esc - quit the game

I hope you can enjoy our game! Thanks for your playing!
